title: Five Nights at Freddy’s 1 Free Download
description:
Get Five Nights at Freddys 1 pc game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Five Nights at Freddy’s 1 ( FNAF 1) is a very unusual horror quest in which players are invited to plunge into an eerie atmosphere in which Light is associated with life, and Darkness with death Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza , where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots’ behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.
From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you’re allowed to use per night (corporate budget cuts, you know). That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights If something isn’t right- namely if Freddybear or his friends aren’t in their proper places, you must find them on the monitors and protect yourself if needed Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition

system_requirements.Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
